entities.description: The time frame for the survey data collection specified in the images.
The relationship of the victim to the offender as classified in the survey.
A numeric indication of the sequence number of offenders involved in the cases.
The total number of valid cases based on the survey data.
The amount and percentage of missing data in the survey.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the specific time period of the data collection.
Indicates the various victim-offender relationships recorded in the survey cases.
Defines the sequential numbering of offenders involved in the cases.
Represents the total number of valid cases reported in the survey.
Indicates the missing data information and its percentage in the survey.
